title: Not loading into games
body: After  picks and bans my game does not load and even after logging in and logging out. I did try restarting my pc once and when I logged back in League gave me some message about reverting something but I do no remember exactly, but I was able to connect to the game and the games after, but having to restart my pc just to play this game is a pain. Is there a solution to this?.

replies.body: Ahhhhh it sounds like your client noticed some damaged or missing files so it started to repatch/repair. Restarting your pc was just a coincidence it sounds like since it must have refreshed your connection which made the client notice the problem.
